attributes.action: Remove the  car cruise ban from Southend sea front
attributes.additional_details: If a car meet is held at Southend normally the car club let the police and officials know about the meet and normally are happy with the car club to have this meet ...  Sign this petition to let us CAR enthusiasts meet at Southend
attributes.background: We as car enthusiasts want Martin terry (council) to remove the car cruise ban from Southend sea front. For many of years the car cruise scene has been going on and some occasions some local car clubs have been meeting regularly there . we BBC Essex and Martin terry to remove this ban.

rejection.details:
Local matters such as this are not usually a matter for the UK Government or Parliament. You might like to raise the issues you are concerned about with your local councillors. You can find out who your local councillors are here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you want to submit a petition to Southend Council the details are here:

http://minutes.southend.gov.uk/elps/
